resources.string:
As this is application based on network and sharing among real people, you can only join Cosy through a member of this community. 

If one of yours friend has used Cosy, you only need to ask them to share the link of their personal page. You can create a free account and join Cosy. 

In case you do not have any friend on Cosy, just going to the site, click on Join Cosy and create account from Personal Page of a salient member. 

 See you on Cosy! Cosy
